name: Richi Interiors
overview:
We Richi Interiors, established in the year 1997 have grown to become one of the reputed companies in the industry.

Clientele: We are one of the most popular trader in India, this can be well seen by our various and popular client list.

Our Quality Assurance: We follow standard industry benchmarks as hallmarks for our quality. Our vast array of designer and corporate seating furniture does not cause any orthopedic problems for the human body to work long hours sitting in one place. Keeping in accordance with stipulated industrial and medical norms of human ergonomics, our products give the users a feeling of comfort and relaxation which helps them not to get fatigued very quickly and makes them willing to work more productively.

Our Strengths: Adherence to the international norms of quality Experienced architect engineers and interior designers Use of high quality raw materials Apt & advanced facilities

Our Team: We owe the credit of success of our organization exercising in this domain to our team of dedicated professionals. Our design development team comprises of some of the finest architects and interior designers of our country who have huge technical expertise and sufficient industry experience to give their creative inputs to our products.

Why Us?: We are the leading suppliers, distributor, wholesaler and importer of home and office décor. If you are looking for cost-effective and attractive way to decorate your home or office premises then we can suffice your needs. We offer seating furniture scientifically developed using ergonomic techniques for executive and lower levels of management as well as for personal use which are medically recommended by doctors and healthcare professionals.
